The problem she has is there is defiantly an uphill battle to win back voters and although she maybe qualified; perceptions of the party may not change over night but I am sure she will be a good leader with the work she has already done for the party but will not swoon vast amounts of voters due to her charismatic charm like say Napoleon would have.

WRITING.TITLE: Cheap VS Expensive Compass
WRITING.TEXT: Part of a youth group, was asked to buy a silva compass that has several features , for all members https://www.amazon.co.uk/Silva-35692-1011-Compass-Expedition-4-360/dp/B000KMFR6A/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8 amp;qid=1517748379 amp;sr=8-1 amp;keywords=silva+compass looks like that but there are others that are cheaper and have the same features. and in total would cost less than #163;100 in total. The guy was obviously really into this sort of stuff but the youth group are only getting a couple of lessons from him and doing a walk. There are cheaper ones around #163;8 or even #163;2 that look the exact same and I don't see how they could actually be that much different to justify such a huge price difference. Thanks in advance
Just a one time lesson, but he comes every few years. You're right I'll just ask him about different models. but i'm afraid he'll say it needs to be the expensive ones, but i'll explain. Thank you.
